ingredients.item: 50g trimmed fine green beans, finely sliced
1 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients Thai Red Curry Paste
1 tsp Cooks’ Ingredients Nam Pla Fish Sauce
3-4 tbsp Blue Dragon Sweet Chilli Dipping Sauce

instructions.step: Soak the kaffir lime leaves in a little boiling water for 2 minutes, drain and finely chop. Cook the beans in boiling water for 1 minute until just tender.
Place the cod, prawns, curry paste, egg, fish sauce, flour, chilli and kaffir lime leaves in a food processor and blitz to give a coarse paste, then season. Stir in the beans.

With wet hands, mould into 12 fishcakes. Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry in 2 batches for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden and cooked throughout. Serve sprinkled with coriander and the dipping sauce on the side.
